column6: "LIVING PLANET" PART 1 (OF 2) The Exiles must stop the Avengers and Doctor Doom before they destroy the Earth! And did someone say Ego, The Living Planet? You bet they did!
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | penciller:James Calafiore | colorist:Jung Choi | inker:Mark McKenna | penciller (cover):Mizuki Sakakibara | letterer:Dave Sharpe
